      • applyExtension

        public void applyExtension(SCRuleMetadata newRuleMetadata,
                           org.w3c.dom.Element extensionElement)
        Description copied from class: SCRuleMetadata
        Applies extension on the given metadata object. Current objects properties are also applied on the new metadata object. The current rule has to be abstract in order to apply the extension. newRuleMetadata metadata object on which the extension has to be applied/ extensionElement extension element
        Overrides:
        applyExtension in class SCRuleMetadata

      • getValidationRule

        public ISCValidationRule getValidationRule(java.lang.String applicationId)
        Description copied from class: SCRuleMetadata
        Constructs and returns the validation rule for the metadata. Note that this rule must be registered with SCValidator in order to evaluate. This method does not register the rule with the validator. applicationId application id validation rule #registerValidationRule(String)
